review: This is a well built, well thought out piece of hardware. The device is very versatile and expandable, of course, it is much better with a prime membership, meaning, anybody that already has a prime membership should seriously consider this over the competition. (eg: roku player, appleTV) as it stands you can do a whole lot with this little box within the confines of a non-technical avarage joe user experience. but, it really shines once you delve into what you can do with this device when you master it's "secrets". If you do a little research and don't mind tinkering, the real power of this device reveals itself. like Apple products,  Amazon Fire TV presents itself as a device that is within a walled garden, Unlike Apple The walled garden has an unlocked gate if your willing to tinker,  that alone makes it heads above any of its competition.
